summary: Comprehensive testing of Spanish meal planning app completed. Backend APIs 100% functional, pricing page works correctly, but session management issue identified in frontend.

ui_bugs.issue: Users get logged out after questionnaire completion, preventing trial generation through UI

integration_issues.issue: Trial banner not consistently visible due to session logout after questionnaire

passed_tests: Backend API - All 12 endpoints working (100% success)
4 pricing plans displayed with correct prices: 3 Días $49, Semana $119, Quincena $199, Mes $349
Subscribe button redirects to auth when not logged in
Trial meal plan generation via API (4 meals: Desayuno, Snack, Comida, Cena)

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Core functionality works, session issue affects trial UI flow

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend session management - users are being logged out after questionnaire completion, which prevents trial generation through UI. The backend trial endpoint works perfectly via API, but the frontend session persistence needs to be fixed for proper user experience.
